PageNode.Introduction: UIAtom AtomNumberComboBox is an advanced AtomComboBox which populates its data based on the input parameters it receives.

PageNode.Name: TextBox
PageNode.Introduction: UIAtom AtomTextBox is a highly sophisticated and advanced Text Box with a variety of options.

PageNode.Name: EmailTextBox
PageNode.Introduction: This is an advanced AtomTextBox with a preset validation to only accept inputs which are properly formatted email addresses.

PageNode.Name: DoubleTextBox
PageNode.Introduction: This is an advanced AtomTextBox with a preset validation to only accept inputs in Double format.

PageNode.Name: Calculator
PageNode.Introduction: This is Calculator.

PageNode.Name: CurrencyTextBox
PageNode.Introduction: This is an advanced AtomDoubleTextBox which prefixes the double input with the currency symbol, as predefined.

PageNode.Name: IntegerTextBox
PageNode.Introduction: UIAtom AtomIntegerTextBox is an advanced AtomDoubleTextBox such that it only accepts integer inputs.

PageNode.Name: PasswordBox
PageNode.Introduction: UIAtom AtomPasswordBox is an advanced AtomTextBox which will automatically mask any input provided into the TextBox.

PageNode.Name: Repeat PasswordBox
PageNode.Introduction: This is an extension of the AtomPasswordBox and functions in the same way, with the addition of comparing the inputs of the two fields for accuracy.

PageNode.Name: TextBoxwithRegEx
PageNode.Introduction: This is an extension of the AtomTextBox where the TextBox will only accept input in the format of the regular expression provided.

PageNode.Name: TitleTextBox
PageNode.Introduction: UIAtoms AtomTitleTextBox is an extension of the AtomTextBox. This control converts all text input into Title Case. A setting is also available wherein all the text can be converted to upper case.

PageNode.Name: FileSize
PageNode.Introduction: This is an advanced control which can quickly and efficiently display the filesize of files within the selected folder in a readable format.

PageNode.Name: FilterTextBox
PageNode.Introduction: This is an advanced TextBox control that can be linked to any control within the WPF framework to filter the bound data contents of that control.
